nodes.data: {"message":"Hi 👋 I am a bot 🤖. I will try to help you as best I can, but I will connect you with a human team member if required. What can I help you with today?","transferToOperatorMessage":false,"quickReplies":["Item / Order Issue 😢","Delivery & Shipping 🚚","Returns & Refunds ↩️","Products 🛍️","Discounts & Payments 💰","Technical 👩‍💻","Something else 🤔"]}
